title: What are the recent best melodies of Tamil movies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Vin meen vizhigal from Thegidi.. Unnakkene venam sollu from Ennai Arindhal.. Neeyum naanum from naanum rowdy thaan.. Yen endral from Idhukku thaane Asapedaruthu Balakumara Bhoomi ennai sututhey and velicha poove from ethir neechal Kaadhal ennulle from Neram Thangamey from naanum rowdy thaan.. These are some of my favorite songs..

nenjoramaaa oru kaadhal - thani oruvan ennai maatrum kaadhale - naanum rowdydhaan Neeyum naanum - naanum rowdydhaan Naan aval illai - mass Aala saachuputta kannala - vil ambu Thalli pogaadhe - accham enbadhu madamaiyada Nenjorathil - pichaikaaran Ye sandakaara - irudhi sutru Thodu vaanam - anegan Un mela oru kannu - rajini murugan
